titleStmt.title: An uprore in the north at Hvll about a moneth since by a company of souldiers against their captaine : with the particular speeches spoke on either side before the said Captaine Edvvard Walbrucke was miserabley wounded and slaine / by H. T.
titleStmt.author: H. T.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
